definition: rules/regulations/constitution/statute/articles of association (of company)/articles of incorporation/charter (of a corporation)/by-laws

sentences.english: But Wang even did not have a girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 而王章程连女朋友都没有。

sentences.english: The original articles of association must be marked with the certification of entry in the register and be returned.
sentences.chinese: 章程的正本必须附记登记证明，并予发还。

sentences.english: Mr. CaeHiew introduces the vacation camp for the kids and has an explanation of camp rules and the regulation.
sentences.chinese: 丘老师为我们介绍假期营，说明营的规矩和章程。

sentences.english: The first option are Crewed Charters , where you .
sentences.chinese: 第一个方案是载人的章程，在那里您。

sentences.english: Item Thirty-three The council has the full rights to explain the regulations.
sentences.chinese: 第三十三条本章程的解释权属本单位的执行委员会。

sentences.english: Each member of the committee should be familiar with the association's constitution and legal obligations.
sentences.chinese: 所有的委员必须熟悉组织章程和法律义务。

sentences.english: The question of changing the club's rules was mooted at the last meeting.
sentences.chinese: 修改俱乐部章程的问题在上次会议上提出审议了。

sentences.english: to review and verify company regulations of wholly state-owned enterprises financed by the Commission.
sentences.chinese: 承办所出资的国有独资公司章程的审核工作。

sentences.english: If there is any inadequacy in this prospectus, the Organiser reserves the right for appropriate amendments.
sentences.chinese: 本章程如有未尽善处，大会保留修改权利。

sentences.english: The Constitution of the Asia-Pacific Telecommunity was signed in Bangkok, Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 亚洲太平洋地区组织章程》在泰国曼谷签订。

sentences.english: The undersigned agrees to follow the bylaw of Monte Jade Science and Technology Association of Hong Kong Limited.
sentences.chinese: 本公司入会后将遵守香港玉山科技协会章程。

sentences.english: Someone in the meeting suggested that a 11-person committee should be appointed to constitute the new rules.
sentences.chinese: 会上有人建议任命一个11人委员会来制定新章程。

sentences.english: If there is any inadequacy in the prospectus and the above guidelines, the organiser reserves the right for appropriate amendments.
sentences.chinese: 如比赛章程及本须知有未尽善处，大会保留修改权利。

sentences.english: Many materials indicate that there was a set of explicit administrative rules.
sentences.chinese: 资料记载表明，宋代贡士庄有较为明确的管理章程。

sentences.english: Article 196 The interpretation of these Articles of Association is vested with the board of directors of the Company.
sentences.chinese: 第一百九十六条本章程由公司董事会负责解释。

sentences.english: The first type is like requiring all company charters to be pro- shareholder.
sentences.chinese: 第一种形式类似于要求所有公司章程都是亲股东的。

definition: to reach an agreement/to agree upon
main content/matter/work/origin of an incident/cause/purpose/subject (of business letter)
first draft/to draw up (a first version)
to lay out (an argument) item by item/memorandum to a superior
